name: a casual game
description:
What's the game all about?

>a casual game< is a game made in around 5 days. I challenged myself to finish and polish a game within a time limit of under a week.

The goal of the game is to shoot little pins into a rotating ball without hitting other pins.  This isn't too hard at the beginning - but difficulty ramps up each level.

Every 10 pins a new level starts, the sphere rotates faster, gets smaller and the sounds get more intense. 


Features
  • piano sounds
  • 1 unlockable instrument (more to come?)
  • highscore system
  • fluent gameplay and animations
